turn.0: Hi, I'm your automated assistant. I can answer your questions about Blind artists.
turn.1: What are the most famous works of art created by the blind?
turn.2: The ways in which the visually impaired are able to create art are giving new insights into the study of sight loss.
turn.3: can you give me some examples of the types of things they are able to create?
turn.4: For example, Ann Roughton is a landscape artist suffering from Macular Degeneration.
turn.5: what does that mean for the artist?
turn.6: Her paintings not only include what she can see with her partial vision, but her work also includes the grey haze that she sees in the center in her vision as a result of her Macular Degeneration.
turn.7: Are there any other interesting aspects about this article?
turn.8: In doing so, she is literally painting sight, giving a new perspective on sight loss.
turn.9: is there any help available for artists who are blind?
turn.10: There are many organizations around the world that offer assistance to the blind.
turn.11: do any of them focus on artists?
turn.12: There are also some that offer assistance and support specifically for blind artists.
